channel.title: Hidden run.bat?easy question
channel.description: [code] @echo off start javaw server [/code] 2: Turns off server: [code] @echo off tskill javaw [/code] only i need it to work through "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/java.exe" because it wont run unless like that

item.title: Hidden run.bat?easy question
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

@echo off
start javaw server

2: Turns off server:

@echo off
tskill javaw

only i need it to work through
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/java.exe”
because it wont run unless like that

Read full topic
